fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Collect gossip regarding an authorized target from up to 5 people during the day.
- Collect gossip regarding an unauthorized target from up to 5 people during the day. 1 Use.
- Confirm rumors surrounding the target you chose the previous day during the night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When a person is selected to collect gossip regarding a topic, they may guess said target's role.
- When confirming rumors, you will be given the roles each person guessed (though not *who* guessed that role), alongside if any of those guesses were correct (though not *which* guess was correct).
- Roleblock immunity
